description:
Tobias Stoeckmann discovered that libXrandr incorrectly handled certain
responses. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial
of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.
(CVE-2016-7947, CVE-2016-7948)
title: libXrandr vulnerabilities
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: Several security issues were fixed in libXrandr.
